backend/main.mo: IC actor managing user profiles with access control and storing contact submissions with admin‑restricted retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining light/dark theme tokens for the SmartBreak design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Initializes theme and query client, rendering the SmartBreak landing page and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Animat: Wrapper that fades and slides elements into view using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Featur: UI card component showing an icon, title, and description for feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: About section describing SmartBreak's research background with animated intro.
Contact form section handling input validation, submission via a mutation hook, and success/error toasts.
Landing hero section with headline, description, demo CTA scroll, and technical brief download button.
Displays six-step visual workflow explaining the SmartBreak detection and isolation process.
Shows societal impacts of SmartBreak with icons and supporting imagery.
Outlines key dangers in LV distribution networks using a list of problems and an infographic.
Presents MATLAB simulation results with a waveform image and bullet-pointed findings.
Describes SmartBreak’s core features and includes a system architecture image.
Lists advanced technologies behind SmartBreak using FeatureCard components.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Reusable section wrapper providing vertical spacing and container layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteFo: Footer with copyright text and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteHe: Fixed header with smooth‑scroll navigation and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInViewAnimation.ts: Custom hook using IntersectionObserver to trigger delayed visibility-based animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query mutation hook for creating contact submissions through an actor and invalidates the submissions query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSmoothScroll.ts: Exposes a function to smoothly scroll to a page element by ID with a fixed header offset.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, custom utilities, and global typography/background rules.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper that merges conditional class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/SmartBreakLandingPage: Composes the SmartBreak marketing landing page by rendering all major section components in order.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind configuration with custom colors, extended theme settings, plugins, and design tokens linked to CSS variables.
project_state.json: Captures the project’s specification, required images, features, and architectural notes for the SmartBreak marketing site.
